p: Plant parts most commonly used for remedies preparation are the aerial part with 45.78% including young, sterile, flowering, and fructified aerial parts; these organs are followed by leaves (17%). These results agree with those in other Catalan language areas such as Segarra [ 20] and Pallars [ 5], the first one closer and not very different in the climate to the Garrigues and the second one farther and with mountain (including high mountain) conditions.
